name: PSCodeHealth
description: Gather PowerShell code quality metrics and enforce quality gates based on these metrics
author: Mathieu Buisson

inputs.name: SourceCodePath
inputs.label: Path to Analyze
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the directory to search for PowerShell files to analyze (it can also be a single script or module). If empty, it defaults to the root of the repo.

inputs.name: TestsPath
inputs.label: Pester Tests Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the file or directory where Pester tests are located. If empty, it defaults to the same location as 'Path to Analyze'.

inputs.name: Recurse
inputs.label: Search SourceCodePath Recursively
inputs.helpMarkDown: To search PowerShell files in SourceCodePath and all subdirectories recursively.
